    malan: MAle Lineage ANlysis

    An R package (https://www.r-project.org/) to perform MAle Lineage ANlysis by simulating genealogies backwards and imposing short tandem repeats (STR) mutations forwards. Intended for forensic Y chromosomal STR (Y-STR) haplotype analyses. Numerous analyses are possible, e.g. number of matches and meiotic distance to matches.

    See documentation included in package (vignettes and manual) at https://mikldk.github.io/malan/.

    Installation

    You first need R (https://www.r-project.org/). Then you can install malan from GitHub by using the remotes package (https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=remotes):

    # install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("mikldk/malan")

    References

    Andersen MM, Balding DJ (2017). How convincing is a matching Y-chromosome profile? PLoS Genet 13(11): e1007028. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pgen.1007028.
